name: Signal Crash
description:
Description

The wi-fi has gone out on the space station. You must travel down to the scrap planet and scavenge for parts so you can make repairs. Watch out for enemies and restore the wi-fi.

This is a game made for the Opera GX Game Jam.

How to Play

Travel down to the scrap heap while avoiding enemies. Hold down when you hit the bottom to start collecting junk. Bring the collected junk back to the waiting mothership at the top of the screen. The more junk you collect the slower your ship will become.

Player 1 - WASD

Player 2 - Arrow Keys

Player 2 can join in at any time. When 2 players are active a living player can pick up the dead player and bring it back to the mothership to respawn.

Credits

Sky Kiyabu - Art, Game Design, Programming, Music

Roxanne Yee - Programming
